quoteText:
We will also share your personal information with other third-party data controllers.
The types of third parties your information may be shared with include, our resellers and other sales and advertising partners, retailers, research organizations, advertisers, ad agencies, advertising networks and platforms, information service providers, fraud monitoring and prevention providers, publishers, and non-profit organizations (with your consent, if required).
Third-party data controllers may also use Adobe products and services to collect and process your personal information.
If you are using an email address that is associated with a business domain (e.g., yourname@businessname.com) to access Adobe's apps and websites, or if you were invited to use the apps and websites by a business, we may provide your personal information to that business.
title: Your personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties
